name: Ohne Ressourcen
description:
You got trapped in a neighborhood with a murderer chasing you. Can you escape before I catch you?



Ohne Ressourcen features...

 New content and graphical improvements  Hold on and escape the terror generated by the entity.  Solve puzzles in (not so) lovely environments Deal with so much darkness and strange sounds


Ohne Ressourcen was made by...


Bird Sick     Master Games   Yon Kenedy
                            




We had a blast making this game over the past half year, we hope you have so much fun playing it!

This is a completely new and updated version of our free DEMO that we launched, ohne ressourcen DEMO with triple the content.

Support me on Patreon
